text: Jiaru wo yiyu, wo bi jie naxie jixiang tisheng ta, dan ta yilian chenshi, shuncong siyu. Ta de qingkuang haobi yi zhi gou [zhu]: Jiaru ni qugan ta, ta jiu shen chu shetou lai; jiaru ni bu li ta, ta ye shen chu shetou lai. Zhe jiushi fouren wo de jixiang de minzhong de qingkuang. Suoyi, ni dang [dui tamen] jiangshu zhexie gushi, yibian tamen shensi.
